Data Access Object

Interfaces

interface FooDao extends CommonRepository, FooDaoCustom {
	// Spring Batch methods
	List<T> findByField1(...);
	T findByField1AndField2(...);
}

interface FooDaoCustom {
	// Application methods
	void doSomething(...);
}

class FooDaoImpl implements FooDaoCustom {
	// Application methods implementations
	@Override
	void doSomething(...) { ... }
}
